history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08626
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PRESERVING THE INDIGENOUS GAMES OF THE PHILIPPINES
SHORT TITLE : Preserving The Indigenous Games Of The Philippines
ABSTRACT : Mandates the National Commission for Culture and the Arts (NCAA) to initiate measures to preserve indigenous games in the country and conduct research on the various sports traditionally played by different indigenous groups to ensure the preservation and development of these games. Requires the Philippine Sports Commission (PSC), in coordination with the Philippine Olympic Committee (POC), and the LGUs to conduct annual regional and national indigenous sports competitions.
ALIAS NAME : “Philippine Indigenous Games Preservation Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELARO, SALVADOR JR. B., ESTRELLA, CONRADO III M., SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R., TAMBUNTING, GUS S., NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C., TEVES, ARNOLFO JR.
